(\{ (\{ 2, 2 \}), (\{ "h1", "Finances" \}), (\{ "text", "\
Guild Treasury\\\r\\n\\r\\n24 Hunter's 888: 4 d.\
\\r\\n29 Hunter's 888: 23 d. (After donating 23 d.)\
" \}), (\{ "page", "Main Page", "default" \}) \})

(\{ (\{ 6, 3 \}), (\{ "text", "\
Madra Rua Dojo\\\r\\nThe Madra Rua Dojo is a school of martial arts, stonework engineering, and other crafts and skills.\
\
\\r\\nThe Dojo was acquired by the gentleman, Joe of Akoma, Esquire, in the month of Green 888, to act as a school for support personnel tied to the Akoma Legion. However, all interested persons are welcome at the Dojo, and no service to the Akoma Legion is required.\
\
\\r\\n\\r\\n\Madra Rua Dojo\ means the \\"School of the Way of the Fox.\\" This name harkens to the school's fox founder, Diego Rossi.\
\
\\r\\n" \}), (\{ "page", "Dojo Members", "members" \}), (\{ "page", "Public Message Board", "message board" \}) \})

(\{ (\{ 4, 4 \}), (\{ "h1", "Guild Internal Message Board" \}), (\{ "text", "\
Advisors\\\r\\nDylan joined as an advisor. He went to bed before he returned to Safe Haven. - Joe 6 Harvest 888 (6 Sep 2007)\
\
\\r\\nJahren, healer for the Great House of Bisclavret, and also Purser of the Akoma Legion, is now an advisor for the Madra Rua Dojo. - Joe, Harvest 888.\
\
" \}), (\{ "text", "\
Welcome Crue\\\r\\nCrue, a wolf, has joined the Madra Rua Dojo, as a new instructor in unarmed combat. He is also a member of the Akoma Legion. I bid him welcome.\\r\\n\
\
\\r\\n- Joe, 22 Hunters 888 (22 Oct 2007)\
\
" \}), (\{ "page", "Main Page", "default" \}), (\{ "paragraph", "\
List of Ring Holders\\\r\\n\\r\\nAs of 22 Hunters 888, these are the ring holders of the Madra Rua Dojo:\
\\r\\n\\\\r\\n\
\Gold\\Joe\\\\r\\n\
\Silver\\Dylan\\\\r\\n\
\Silver\\Jahren\\\\r\\n\
\Silver\\Rachelle \\\\r\\n\
\Silver\\James \\\\r\\n\
\Bronze\\Reece\\\\r\\n\\\\r\\nWhat was surprising to me was that we have two children students: Miss Rachelle, daughter of Bruno, the master smith of the Hands of St. Trahern, and James. Both have silver rings, which grant them the right to come and go to the Dojo as they wish. I will send them scrolls to see if they still wish to keep their rings and their place in the Dojo, or to return them if they do not believe they will be active. I am unsure who Reece is, but I shall also write to him about his place in the Dojo. - Joe, 22 Hunter's 888\
\
" \}) \})

(\{ (\{ 6, 2 \}), (\{ "text", "\
Members\\\r\\n\\r\\nJoe of Akoma, Owner (Gold ring)\
\
\\r\\nJahren, Purser (Silver ring)\
\
\\r\\nDylan, Advisor (Silver ring)\
\
\\r\\nCrue, Unarmed Combat Instructor (Silver ring)\
\
" \}), (\{ "page", "Introduction to the Madra Rua Dojo", "guest" \}) \})

(\{ (\{ 6, 4 \}), (\{ "h1", "Public Dojo Message Board" \}), (\{ "text", "\Mister Dylan Appointed as Advisory Member\\
\
\\r\\n\\r\\nOn the 6th of Harvest, 888, Mister Dylan, the proprietor of the Safe Haven guild, was made an advisory member of the Madra Rua Dojo. We welcome the deepening relationship between Safe Haven and Madra Rua Dojo, and look forward to a flourishing of arts and sciences to bring enlightenment and wellness to the body, mind, and spirit.\
\
\\r\\n\\r\\n\\
\\r\\n\\r\\n\Hiring Teachers, Seeking Students\\
\
\\r\\n\\r\\nThe Madra Rua Dojo is presently accepting applications for qualified teachers and students of martial arts and stonework engineering. Please send all inquiries to Joe of Akoma, Esquire.\
\
\\r\\n\\r\\n\\
\\r\\n\\r\\n\Madra Rua Dojo Acquired by Joe of Akoma, Esquire\\
\
\\r\\nThe Madra Rua Dojo has come under the proprietorship of Joe of Akoma, Esquire, as of the 30th day of Green, in the Year 888 Apres le Miracle. Joe of Akoma is also the commanding general of the Foreign Legion of Akoma, also known as the Akoma Legion, as well as the holder of the estate of Le Petit Collines, a fortified manor house in the foothills of the Rothos Mountains.\
\
" \}), (\{ "page", "Introduction for Guests", "guest" \}), (\{ "page", "Dojo Members", "members" \}) \})

\

\
" \}), (\{ "page", "Main Page", "default" \}) \})

(\{ (\{ 5, 2 \}), (\{ "h1", "Teaching" \}), (\{ "paragraph", "\
Skills and Careers\\\r\\n\\r\\n\Present Skills:\ unarmed, stonemasonry, tailoring, dilettante.\\r\\n\
\
\\r\\n\\r\\n\Proposed Skills:\ fencing, squire, first-aid, healer.\\r\\n\
\
" \}), (\{ "npc_tokens", "" \}), (\{ "text", "\

\\r\\n25 Hunter's 888: 61.\
\
" \}), (\{ "page", "Main Page", "default" \}) \})
